Hey Zeke! Eu sei o que deves estara pens.English:
Hey Zeke! I know what you might be thinking,
me at the 9AM metro, wtf...

Depois daquela festa de ontem, voltei a.English:
After that party last night, I fell asleep
again. What a shame, you didn't went...
IT WAS EPIC!

Só para te dar um spoiler, a tua crush \.English:
Just to give you a spoiler, your crush
Olivia, jumped into the pool, topless!
Crazy, right?

A mesma pessoa que já recebeu dois prémi.English:
The same person, who was received two
prizes in neurotechnology...

O que é certo é que esta ressaca, o patr.English:
Whats for sure is this hangover, the boss
is gonna kill me...

E tu? Continuas a investigar a fuga de\n.English:
And you? Are you still investigating
the data breach from TitanMining?

Haha... Nunca foste de muitas palavras,\.English:
Haha... You never were too much of a talker,
but  since you started investigating that
data breach you haven't been the same...

Não sei se ouviste os rumores, mas acham.English:
I don't know if you heard the rumors, they
think V has been murdered by the...
You know who...

Ninguém sabe o que lhe aconteceu, a últi.English:
Nobody knows what happend, his last post on
the foruns was from more than 3 months ago.

Bem, parece que chegamos. Eu hoje não vo.English:
Well, looks like we have arrived. I'm not
going to the office today, I have to go
with the boss to a meeting.

Metade mulher, metade baleia!.English: Half a woman, half a whale...
